string-array.name: Description
string-array.item: The Weekly View tab will allow you to create, view, and edit your weekly schedule
The Calendar View will allow you to view, add, remove items from your monthly calendar
The University Bookstore will open a new window and direct you to the UMKC Bookstore
The Educational Resources will direct you to a page that will allow you to view study resources
Need to de-stress? Check out these mindfulness techniques
Tired? Check out our entertainment center
